words.source: H1696 wayyiqtol 3ms Piel of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'spake', ESV 'spoke', NASB 'spoke'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. cstr. of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying' (ESV omits in some editions), NASB 'saying'
